original_text: Our Lord, you always do what is right. Today we are very ashamed. The people of Judah, Jerusalem and all Israel have not been faithful to you. You have sent our people away to many countries. Some are near and some are far away. We are all ashamed because we have turned away from you.
korean_text: 주여 공의는 주께로 돌아가고 수치는 우리 얼굴로 돌아옴이 오늘과 같아서 유다 사람들과 예루살렘 거민들과 이스라엘이 가까운 곳에 있는 자들이나 먼 곳에 있는 자들이 다 주께서 쫓아내신 각국에서 수치를 당하였사오니 이는 그들이 주께 죄를 범하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: Our Lord, you always do what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 주여, 당신은 항상 옳은 일을 하십니다.

sentences.original_text: and all Israel have not been faithful to you.
You have sent our people away
Some are near and some are far away.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 것들은 가깝고 어떤 것들은 멀리 떨어져 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: because we have turned away from you.
